Name: Bouncy Bunnies
About the game: Gameplay: Bouncy bunnies is a running race game against your friends in a colorful platform world. Take the boost to run faster or find the shortest path to be the first bunny to reach the goal. Choose between 8 different levels. Collect carrots to get higher score. Keyboard and mouse works but use a controller to get the best experience of the game. You can jump but also double jump to get further. Host a server and invite your friends to join. FEATURES: - 1-4 players - 4 different bunnies - 8 Levels (Multiplayer) - 1 Level (Single player) - Carrots pickup - Power boost pickup - Keyboard and mouse support - Gamepad support
